extension.description: Supports 2016,1080p and 720p resolutions.[CR]1) ENABLE Playbacks Stars[CR]2) ENABLE Default 60hz or 50hz[CR]3) Active info key fro display fps and hz video[CR]Settings does not update to show HDMI mode changes made using this add-on.[CR][CR]Please run Clean Up before you Uninstall or Disable.[CR]Thanks to pcristi [CR]Credits: jk-nz, MINIX-Ken, HardwareGuru, KenV99, Roman_V_M, takoi and Abbe
